reports.doctor_en:
üß† Clinical Report ‚Äì For Ophthalmologist

Predicted Stage: **SEVERE**
Model Confidence: 83.85%  
Risk Score: 95.26%  

Model Insights:
‚Ä¢ Multi-model fusion (EfficientNet, ResNet50, ViT, RF, XGB)
‚Ä¢ Explainability overlays (GradCAM++, LIME, SHAP) confirm lesion localization.
‚Ä¢ Lesion summary extracted with threshold-based segmentation.

Clinical Correlation:
‚Ä¢ Lesion statistics align with early vascular leakage and microaneurysm regions.
‚Ä¢ Gradient-based heatmaps confirm probable DR zones.
‚Ä¢ Suggested correlation with HbA1c and fundus angiography if available.

Metrics:
‚Ä¢ Accuracy: 0.947
‚Ä¢ F1-score: 0.938
‚Ä¢ AUC/ROC: 0.971

Recommendation:
Review overlays before confirming DR stage.  
Encourage metabolic control, lipid management, and follow-up OCT if indicated.
reports.research_en:
üìä VisionAI Research Report

Model Stack:
‚Ä¢ CNN Ensemble: EfficientNet, ResNet50, ViT
